casebody.data:
Thursday, January 30, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

96-2786. State v. Cola.

Cuyahoga App. No. 70483. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and a claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for appeal bond and for stay of execution of the judgment of the court appeals,

*1551IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for appeal bond and for stay of execution be, and hereby is, denied.
